## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G08950](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G08950)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>HCC1</u>
- **Gene Name:** homologue of the copper chaperone SCO1
- **Description:**   electron transport SCO1/SenC family protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2097673
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Transcripts:
   -  [AT3G08950.1](https://www.arabidopsis.org/gene?name=AT3G08950.1)
## Gene Ontology:
   - [GO:0009793](https://amigo.geneontology.org/amigo/term/GO:0009793)&nbsp;---&nbsp;acts upstream of or within&nbsp;---&nbsp;embryo development ending in seed dormancy
   - [GO:0005739](https://amigo.geneontology.org/amigo/term/GO:0005739)&nbsp;---&nbsp;located in&nbsp;---&nbsp;mitochondrion
   - [GO:0009793](https://amigo.geneontology.org/amigo/term/GO:0009793)&nbsp;---&nbsp;involved in&nbsp;---&nbsp;embryo development ending in seed dormancy
   - [GO:0033617](https://amigo.geneontology.org/amigo/term/GO:0033617)&nbsp;---&nbsp;involved in&nbsp;---&nbsp;mitochondrial cytochrome c oxidase assembly
   - [GO:0005507](https://amigo.geneontology.org/amigo/term/GO:0005507)&nbsp;---&nbsp;enables&nbsp;---&nbsp;copper ion binding
## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [CS66573]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;SNAP-tagged HCC1 was able to rescue embryo-lethal phenotype of hcc1-1 homozygous mutants producing plants smaller than transgenic SNAP-tagged HCC1 in wild-type background.
